title: Discovery of Romance
overview: Xia Tian, a furniture designer, meets the owner of the design company Xu Jie Hao, who was her ex-boyfriend. Fate brought them together again, forcing them to work on the same project. It would seem that once extinguished feelings flare up with even greater force, but what to do with real life? After all, Xia Tian has a fiance Guan Xin, whom she loves and respects. How to make a choice? How to distinguish true love in search of romance and not step on the same rake?
